relation: My thanks to the Woiner Foundation for putting on a really great ride, 3-2-1 Ride Metric Century. Despite this being the inaugural year for the event, it was almost flawless. A fuller account can be had here Dragonman’s Bicycle Blog. Hope to see more people out there next year! Anyone do the shorter rides? If so, how were they? This topic was modified 1 yr, 9 mos ago by PghDragonMan. Reason: bad link syntax
